data.text: @theclevertwit The seats located in the exit row are extra legroom seats, that's the reason of the additional charge, since are different from standard seats. Regards.

@theclevertwit Hi, if the flight is from/to Brazil, one of the conditions to sit in an emergency seat is to speak fluent Portuguese. Also, remember LATAM crew can verify whether the passenger complies with all the requirements to sit in this seat. If not, a regular seat will be assigned.

@AleKoretzky Hello, we hope you are doing well, please send us a DM with your reservation code (6 letters) or you ticket number (13 numbers) and the full name of the passenger in the reservation. We stay tuned.
@austindcaldwell Hello, we already message you, please check your inbox. Kind regards.
@1derekbenson If you wish, we can provide our assistance by DM. Kind regards
@chefinhapdg Hi, in order to assist you, please DM us the reservation code (6 letters) or the ticket number (13 digits) and the full name of the passenger. We look forward to your response.

@oberoi_karan Hi, for proper assistance, we ask you to please get in touch with our specialized luggage area via WhatsApp: https://t.co/4vhiZOwdud, or let us know by DM if you already have a case created regarding the issue with your baggage. We look forward to hearing from you. Regards.

entity.name: WhatsApp
entity.description: WhatsApp Messenger, or simply WhatsApp, is an internationally available American freeware, cross-platform centralized instant messaging and voice-over-IP service owned by Meta Platforms.

data.text: @_mariconazo_ Hi, it is not recommended or safe to share your private data publicly, so please contact us via DM with the necessary information to assist you with your request. We look forward to hearing from you.

@NattyNat210 Hello, by this means we can generate a quote and send you a link to complete the payment by credit card. For that we ask you to provide us via DM with all the information about the trip. We remain attentive.

data.text: @wheresmypen_ Hi, please send us a message via DM, regards.
@Patrick_2004 Hello, we can assist you by this means, 0please send us more details via DM of your request. Regards

@paola_vargas_3 Please send us via DM all the details of the desired flight as well as the information of each passenger, email and contact number including country code. So we can assist you in that process. We stay tuned.

@paola_vargas_3 Hello, sometimes our website's performance can be affected by browser’s history. We suggest for you to delete the history and cookies on your computer. Also, try with a different browser. If the error persists, DM us a screenshot, to evaluate the best way to assist you. Regards.

@PiitaSmiles We can assist you by this means, in order to provide you with assistance, please indicate your reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 digits) and the full name of the passengers.
@evalantsoght Hola, tu caso se encuentra en gestión. Te enviaremos mayor detalle vía tu correo a la brevedad. Saludos.

@etherealysis Hi , in order to assist you, please send us via DM your reservation code (6 letters) or the ticket number (13 digits) and the full name of the passenger. We look forward to your response.
@vicmayol No podemos enviarte DM, es por ello que te sugerimos que tú nos envíes tus datos. Quedamos atentos.
@vicmayol Recuerda que para poder ayudarte necesitamos que nos envíes los datos anteriormente solicitados. Quedamos atentos.
@vicmayol Hola Victor, para brindarte una mejor asistencia envíanos un DM con el código de reserva (6 letras) o número de orden. Lamentamos las molestias ocasionadas. Quedamos atentos.
@matheus_phd Hello, we hope you are doing well, please send us a DM with your reservation code (6 letters) or your ticket number (13 numbers) and the full name of the passenger. We stay tuned.

@dqalombardi Hello, we hope you are doing well, please send us to our DM the following information: Full name of the passenger, email address, document number. We stay tuned.

@tylerpatterson Sure, in order to check your seats, please tell us via DM your reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 digits) and the full name of the passengers. We will be waiting for your message
@yoezus Hello, please let us know the details of your inquiry via DM. We will be attentive.

@Ceci93824483 Hola, no es recomendable ni seguro el compartir tus datos privados de manera pública, por lo que te pedimos nos contactes vía DM con el número de caso, así como te pedimos eliminar tu comentario. Quedamos atentos.

@Lolizambrano3 Hola, un gusto saludarte. Envíanos por favor vía DM, el código de tu reserva(6 letras) o el número de tiquete(13 dígitos), correo electrónico y nombre completo de quien viaja. Quedamos atentos a tu respuesta. Saludos.

@mauricefemenias Hi, in order to assist you with your request, please provide us via DM with the reservation code (6 letters) or ticket number (13 digits) and the passenger's full name. We will be waiting for your reply.
@bmannheim Te hemos enviado un mensaje vía DM.

@PointsToPointB Hello, we understand your annoyance and disagreement, keep in mind the options provided and also that flights are subject to changes and availability. We look forward to hearing from you.
@JainamJm Hello, we just left a direct message. Regards.

@KathyAlonzo17 Hello, we hope you are doing well, to help you in the best possible way, tell us by dm the code of your reservation (6 letters) or the ticket number (13 numbers) and the full name of the traveler. We will be waiting for your answer. Greetings.
@Sara066385202 Hola, bríndanos mayor detalle de lo sucedido mediante DM. Quedamos atentos.

urls.title: UPDATE 2: LATAM AIRLINES PERU FLIGHT LA 2213

data.text: We inform you that after the reopening of the Lima International Airport, the LATAM Group will now resume its operations. We recommend passengers to check the status of their flight on https://t.co/Gm0DtSGsS8. Click here for more information: https://t.co/Ik3HMwuqqQ
@Katlevy_meow Hi, to assist you please let us know more details via DM. We look forward to hearing from you.

@xulucy Hello, we hope you are doing well, to help you in the best possible way, tell us by dm the code of your reservation (6 letters) or the ticket number (13 numbers) and the full name of the traveler. We will be waiting for your answer. Greetings
@vicmayol Si es correcto, envíanos los datos vía mensaje privado para una mejor asistencia.

@vicmayol Para ayudarte de la mejor forma posible, indícanos vía dm el código de tu reserva (6 letras) o número de ticket (13 números) y nombre completo de quien viaja. Estaremos pendientes de tu respuesta. Saludos.

data.text: -NEW INFORMATION- We have issued a statement with more information about the situation at Lima’s Jorge Chávez International Airport: https://t.co/Qf5xJtJgLU
We inform that the incident in Lima has caused a high volume of calls to our Call Center. We recommend you to visit our site and make the changes directly in My Trips section.

urls.title: UPDATE 3: LATAM AIRLINES PERU FLIGHT LA 2213

data.text: Travel flexibility is available to all passengers affected by the suspension of flights at Lima’s Jorge Chávez International Airport. For more information, visit: https://t.co/ZmuMvk5CW1

data.text: @Ceci93824483 Tu caso se está escalando, en cuanto tengamos una respuesta formal será enviado a tu correo por lo que te pedimos estar atenta. Saludos.

@grizzly_paw We've verified the reservation you've sent us by DM, and due to the current events at Lima's airport, the flight has been canceled. In order to assist you, please DM us the details of the new desired flights. We look forward to hearing from you
@PointsToPointB Hi, in order to assist you, please DM us the reservation code (6 letters) or the ticket number (13 digits) and the full name of the passenger. We look forward to your response.
@Ceci93824483 Hola, comprendemos lo que nos indicas por tal motivo te sugerimos estar atenta a los medios de contacto. Saludos. https://t.co/Hp7JCSUm5q
@Ceci93824483 Hola, tu requerimiento está siendo gestionado por nuestra área especialista, te sugerimos aguardar respuesta en tus medios de contacto. Saludos. https://t.co/Hp7JCSDj3q

@Ceci93824483 Hola, hemos verificado tu requerimiento y vemos que aún se encuentra bajo análisis y trabajo, por lo que te pedimos que estés al pendiente de tu correo electrónico para una pronta respuesta. También hemos evidenciado que tus vuelos con Delta se encuentran confirmados. Saludos.
@Cc69020760 Hi , in order to assist you, please send us via DM the reservation code (6 letters) or the ticket number (13 digits) and the full name of the passenger. We look forward to your response.

@Srdelanoche5 Hello, in order to provide you with proper assistance, by DM please check the payment receipt and tell us your reservation code of 6 capital letters or ticket number (13 numbers) along with the full name of the passenger and email. Regards.
@Ralfeg7 What they tell you is not the established process. The issuing travel agency is the one that must provide the refund because they have the control of the ticket.
@Ralfeg7 The issuing travel agency has to contact our agency support. We look forward to receiving a call from your agency in order to solve this situation. Regards.
@Ralfeg7 Rafael, for refund purposes the passenger must contact the travel agency that issued the ticket. Kind regards.
@flklrsurf We invite you to take special care to avoid affecting your health, you are free to communicate properly and following the recommendations of our crew. Regards.
@MosesIg2 Hello, by this means we can assist you; please send us details of the requirement by DM to review it and assist you properly. We will stay tuned.

@terrenobaldiu We can help you to add your miles to your Latam Pass account, just tell us by DM your email, the flights you want to add, full name of the passengers in the reservation, reservation code or ticket number. We are waiting for your message. Kind regards.
@Leesie_Lu Hello, we hope you are doing well, please send us a DM with your request or doubt. We stay tuned.
@PersianThunder_ Hello, please send us more details of your request via DM. Regards

urls.title: Self-service and Contact Center | LATAM Airlines
urls.description: Here you will find the answer to the most frequent questions. You can communicate with us on our WhatsApp number or call us if you still have any questions and we will do our best to help you.

data.text: @Ralfeg7 The issuing travel agency has to contact our agency support. Please call us in order to solve this situation. Regards.
@Ralfeg7 In the event that your travel agency has problems in the process, the issuing travel agency have to contact our agency support. Regards
@Ralfeg7 Rafael, for refund purposes the passenger must contact the travel agency that issued the ticket. Kind regards.
@homeroomtravel Hi, we have sent a response through DM. Regards.
@Fescobar19723 Hola, te entregamos respuesta por dm.
@Fescobar19723 Hola, indícanos vía DM (mensaje directo) el código de reserva o número del ticket, nombre y apellido del pasajero. Quedamos atentos.
@PresTITANRaptor it is a pleasure for us to assist you. Best regards.
@HartmutBock Hola, un gusto saludarte, indícanos vía DM como te podemos asesorar, gracias por escribirnos. Quedamos atentos a tu respuesta. Saludos.
@PresTITANRaptor We will be waiting for your reply.

@PresTITANRaptor Hello, in order to provide you with proper assistance, please tell us by DM your Latam reservation code (6 upper letters, no numbers) or ticket number (13 digits), along with the full name of the passenger and also your email. Regards.

urls.title: Requisitos para viajar | LATAM Airlines
urls.description: Conoce las restricciones para viajar dentro y fuera de Estados Unidos.

data.text: @javichilitweets Hola, en este caso si es una vacuna de dosis 2 dosis y solo cuentas con una, deberás presentar la prueba PCR. Puedes revisar mayor información y detalle de las vacunas aceptadas mediante este enlace: https://t.co/ddbVvN9JhG. Saludos.
